pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Collection of Graphon Estimation Methods // Provides a not-so- comprehensive list of methods for estimating graphon, a symmetric measurable function, from a single or multiple of observed networks. For a detailed introduction on graphon and popular estimation techniques, see the paper by Orbanz, P. and Roy, D.M.(2014) doi:10.1109/TPAMI.2014.2334607. It also contains several auxiliary functions for generating sample networks using various network models and graphons.
